translations.AppInitiated: Drip App has been initiated. You can use it by typing /{commandName}.
translations.commandHint: Open the DRIP App to control your DRIP.

errors.notInVehicle: You must be in a vehicle to use this command.
errors.notAllowedVehicle: You are not allowed to use this command in this vehicle.
errors.passengerNotAllowed: You are not allowed to use this command as a passenger.
errors.extraDoesNotExistOnVehicle: The vehicle does not have an extra with the name {extra}.
errors.notAllowedOutsideControl: You are not allowed to use this command outside of the vehicle.
errors.notAllowedOutsideControlRange: You are not allowed to use this command outside of the vehicle. You must be within {range} meters of the vehicle.
